name: Cabin Exorcist
description:
Immerse yourself in this creepy cabin filled with horrors.

Developed by 4 members for the GDL Spooky Jam 2018. 78 hour time-frame.

Jason Pushkar - Modeler and Texture Artist

Jensen Verlaan - System Design and Level Designer

Peter Francis - System Design and Sound Design

Emily Bendevis - 2D Asset Creation

Winning plays the loss message, but if you burn all the items you should have the win state.
